name: AlarmSounds
0:
”Alexa, start Alarm Sounds”
”Alexa, ask Alarm Sounds to play a burglar alarm”
”Alexa, ask Alarm Sounds to play a fire alarm sound”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alarm sounds
des:
Disclaimer: this skill is a prank skill for entertainment purposes only.

*** AWESOME 4 MINUTE LONG ALARM SOUNDS ***

Scare off intruders!
Wake up lazy teenagers!
Prank your friends!
Put the house on Red Alert!

Say "Alexa, start Alarm Sounds" to hear a random alarm sound.

You can also say "Alexa, ask Alarm Sounds to play [alarm name]"

Currently available alarms:

- Fire/Smoke Alarm
- Car Alarm
- Burglar Alarm
- Air Raid Siren
- Emergency Alarm
- Alarm Clock

If you'd like to see more alarms please share your suggestions with us by emailing hello@topvoiceapps.com

If you like this skill, please leave a 5* rating and review to help us make more amazing Alexa Skills.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
